SEARCH
Module org.klojang.db

Package org.klojang.db

package org.klojang.db
Database utilities aimed at providing a quick route for database data to be inserted into Klojang templates.
  • Class
    Description
    BeanifierFactory<T>
    A factory for ResultSetBeanifier instances producing JavaBeans of type <T>.
    BindInfo
    BindInfo objects allow you to finetune or override how values should be bound into a PreparedStatement.
    KJSQLException
    A RuntimeException that may either wrap an SQLException or indicate a Klojang-native error condition while processing or executing SQL.
    MappifierFactory
    A Factory for ResultSetMappifier instances.
    NamedParameter
    Represents a single named parameter within a SQL statement.
    ResultSetBeanifier<T>
    Converts the rows in a JDBC result sets into JavaBeans.
    ResultSetMappifier
    Converts the rows in a JDBC result sets into JavaBeans.
    ResultSetMismatchException
     
    ResultSetReadException
    Thrown when the values in a ResultSet could not be transported to a JavaBean.
    Row
    A thin wrapper around a Map<String,Object> instance mimicking some of the behaviour of the ResultSet class.
    SQL
    A factory for SQLQuery, SQLInsert and SQLUpdate instances.

    SQLInsertBuilder
     
    SQLQuery
